title: Base Workspace
description: This workspace template is the foundation for TRE workspaces and workspace services.

shared_storage_quota.title: Shared Storage Quota
shared_storage_quota.description: Quota (in GB) to set for the VM Shared Storage.

enable_airlock.title: Enable Airlock
enable_airlock.description: Allow safe import and export to the workspace

app_service_plan_sku.title: App Service Plan SKU
app_service_plan_sku.description: The SKU that will be used when deploying an Azure App Service Plan.

address_space_size.title: Address space size
address_space_size.description: Network address size (small, medium, large or custom) to be used by the workspace.

configure_review_vms.title: Configure Review VMs
configure_review_vms.description: Allow TRE to automatically create and delete review VMs for airlock approvals

airlock_review_config.title: Airlock Review Config
airlock_review_config.description: Configuration for Airlock Review feature. Needs to be set up after workspace creation

import_vm_workspace_service_id.title: Import Review Workspace Service ID
import_vm_workspace_service_id.description: ID for Workspace Service ID where to deploy Review user resources

import_vm_user_resource_template_name.title: Import Review VM User Resource Template Name
import_vm_user_resource_template_name.description: Template Name for User Resource for reviewing Import Requests

export_vm_workspace_service_id.title: Export Review Workspace Service ID
export_vm_workspace_service_id.description: ID for Workspace Service ID where to deploy Review user resources

export_vm_user_resource_template_name.title: Export Review VM User Resource Template Name
export_vm_user_resource_template_name.description: Template Name for User Resource for reviewing Export Requests

address_space.title: Address space
address_space.description: Network address space to be used by the workspace if 'Address space size' is custom.

client_id.title: Application (Client) ID
client_id.description: The AAD Application Registration ID for the workspace.

client_secret.title: Application (Client) Secret
client_secret.description: The AAD Application Registration secret for the workspace. This value will be stored in the Workspace Key Vault.

create_aad_groups.title: Create AAD Groups for each workspace role
create_aad_groups.description: Create AAD Groups for the workspace roles. If this is set to true, the workspace will create new AAD Groups.

aad_redirect_uris.title: AAD Redirect URIs
aad_redirect_uris.description: Redirect URIs for the AAD app in Automatic Auth mode
